tournament.name: Lakshman Kadirgamar Memorial Debating Championship 2025

feedback.answer: Yes, for the reasons given in the OA

I agreed with all the statements and comments given. The feedback felt very true and I am very glad they gave us constructive feedback criticism instead of just criticism. I was able to understand clearly what the faults were as well as my strengths as well. Hats off for that!

The feedback given by this adjudicator particularly were very true and we were clearly able to understand where we went wrong and which parts we got right.. I am very grateful for the proper feedback given in the sense that he pointed out exactly what we needed to fix and why he awarded the win and what factors impacted that. It was easy to comprehend and gave us an idea of what exactly we needed to work on. Really appreciate it!
Yes, for the reasons given in the OA

tournament.motion: This house, as Siripala, regrets SLC's suspension by the ICC You are a Siripala, a fan of Sri Lanka cricket. The Sri Lankan sports ministry recently sacked the entire board of Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) on grounds of poor performance during the recent World Cup, and alleged corruption. The International Cricket Council (ICC) views this as a violation of SLC's obligation to manage its affairs autonomously without government interference. As a result of the suspension, Sri Lanka's hosting rights for the U19 World Cup were revoked, and the ICC will control finances for any SLC teams at international competitions for the duration of the suspension.

This house, as the soldier, would choose to stay in the closet You are a closeted gay man in the military. You are a talented recruit with a high chance of climbing up the ranks. You believe that your chances of being promoted will decrease if you come out as gay.
This house believes that the practice of starting relationships in which the participants do not intend a long-term future does more harm than good
This house believes that international media should portray the scale of protests against dictators in an exaggerated manner

This house supports a social norm where individuals prioritise the maintenance of a few close friendships over the expansion of their social circle (i.e. spending more time with existing friends instead of actively trying to make new friends)
This house regrets the demonisation of nationalism
This house supports the integration of generative AI (e.g.- ChatGPT) into secondary and tertiary education systems (i.e. for proofreading and paraphrasing, for research in essays and projects, etc.)

In countries with a history of civil conflict, this house would not allow formerly violent insurgent groups and their members to contest elections (e.g. the Irish Republican Army contesting elections as Sinn Fein in Ireland, the FARC in Colombia)

This house prefers a world in which political parties in developing countries based themselves on class issues (e.g. the JVP in Sri Lanka, the Socialist Party of Chile) instead of ethnic/religious issues (e.g. the TNA in Sri Lanka, the United Malays National Organisation in Malaysia)
This House opposes the "move fast, break things" philosophy in the tech sector
THR the glorification of the socially acceptable path in life

Assuming feasibility, this house would allow individuals to sell their units of Intelligence Quotient (IQ)

For the purposes of the debate, an intelligence quotient (IQ) refers to a total score derived from a set of standardized tests that can accurately assess human intelligence. Through intelligence, humans possess the cognitive abilities to learn, form concepts, understand, apply logic, and reason.
Motion - As a star athlete, this house prefers opting out of having serious relationships during their playing career (Kevin Durant)

Motion - TH as Nimuthu would quit his job and enter politics

Nimuthu Pathiraja is 30 years old working in a stable private-sector firm as a manager earning around Rs. 500,000 per month. His career provides opportunities for gradual advancement, and a structured work-life balance. He comes from a middle-class background, is not married, but is in a long-term committed relationship and beginning to think about future responsibilities.


For Nimuthu, politics is one of the major goals of his life. He wants to create meaningful social impact and improve the lives of citizens. His likely trajectory would involve building experience and public support, and eventually aspiring to a position in Parliament.

Assuming revenue neutrality, THW abolish major taxes ( Eg:- PAL,Income taxes,Corpotate Taxes) and replace it with increases in VAT.

Revenue neutrality means adjusting a tax system so that any new taxes or changes to existing taxes do not increase or decrease the government’s total tax revenue overall.VAT (Value-Added Tax) is a consumption tax where businesses pay tax on the value they add and consumers ultimately bear the cost through the final purchase price.

Fan service refers to the inclusion of content in films, TV shows, anime, or other media that is primarily designed to please or excite the audience, rather than to advance the plot or develop characters. This often includes sexualized imagery, nostalgic references, or popular character cameos added to attract fans.

THR the prevalence of fan service in modern entertainment media
This House regrets the decline in Western military interventions following the 2003 Iraq War.
tournament.question: Did you agree with their decision?
How carefully did the judge track content brought out by speakers in the debate? (0-10)
How well did the judge organize the content in the debate into clashes during their OA? (0-10)
How well did the judge evaluate and weigh the clashes (0-10)
